mapper.insert: insert into stat_product_shop_daily (SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, AMOUNT, COST, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, COST1, COST2, COST3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3 ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, AMOUNT, COST, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, COST1, COST2, COST3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3 from stat_product_shop_daily
